# Clean up Blast table

```{bash}
head -2 ../output/pycnopodia-uniprot_blastx_sep.tab

```


# JOIN tables in R


```{r}
bltabl <- read.csv("../output/pycnopodia-uniprot_blastx_sep.tab", sep = '\t', header = FALSE) #blast table
spgo <- read.csv("../data/uniprotkb_GO.tsv", sep = '\t', header = TRUE) # annotation table
```

```{r}
pyncoannot <- left_join(bltabl, spgo,  by = c("V3" = "Entry")) %>%
select(V1, V3, V13, Protein.names, Organism, Gene.Ontology..biological.process.) 
```
